title: Midnight Club: LA
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German and Spanish.   THE BEST WAY TO SEE LOS ANGELES IS AT 245 MPH. Race at breakneck speeds through the streets of modern-day L.A. recreated in stunning detail. Drive the hottest real-world tuners, muscle and luxury cars, exotics and superbikes on the streets today. Customize your vehicle with the best after-market performance parts and custom kits. Street racing with no track, no load times, no rules: Welcome to the Midnight Club.   Retired Features:  Rate My Ride and Driving Test unlocks for Midnight Club Los Angeles on Xbox 360 will no longer be available in-game as of 5/31/14.  ©2006-2009 Rockstar Games. Rockstar Games, R*, Midnight Club marks/logos owned by Take-Two Interactive Software.  All other marks/designs property of their owners.  See manual for details. All Rights Reserved.  Use of this software subject to license in game manual & online at rockstagames.com/eula.  Non-transferable access to special features such as exclusive, unlockable, downloadable or online content, services, or functions may require single-use serial code, additional fee, internet connection, and/or online account registration (13+). Special features may not be available to all users and may on 30 days notice be terminated, modified, or offered under different terms.   This videogame is fictional, doesn’t depict any actual event, person, or entity; any similarities are coincidental.  We don’t endorse or encourage any conduct depicted.  Unauthorized copying, reverse engineering, transmission, public performance, rental, pay for play, or circumvention of copy protection is prohibited.

childDownloads.title: MC:LA First Look Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Midnight Club: Los Angeles, the first next-generation offering from this storied racing franchise, shows you the first look trailer. Featuring a stunning recreation of Los Angeles, Breaking genre conventions, as always, is paramount to the Midnight Club series. Midnight Club: Los Angeles will be no different.  Download this trailer.

childDownloads.title: Midnight Club: Los Angeles -- Cops Trailer
childDownloads.description: Witness the age old struggle between street racers and the relentless LA cops in this special Midnight Club: Los Angeles Cop Trailer.  The next iteration of the highly acclaimed Midnight club racing franchise is out now.

childDownloads.title: Midnight Club: Los Angeles - Trailer 2 (HD)
childDownloads.description: The best way to see Los Angeles is at 245mph. Illegal street racing with no track, no load times and no rules. The next iteration of the highly acclaimed Midnight Club racing franchise is coming October 7 2008. Download trailer 2 now.

childDownloads.title: Midnight Club: Los Angeles -- Trailer 4
childDownloads.description: In Midnight Club: Los Angeles, you take the role of a street racer who has just arrived in the city to establish yourself as the best of the best.  Get an exclusive look at your arrival in Los Angeles in Trailer 4.  The next iteration of the highly acclaimed Midnight Club racing franchise is out now.

childDownloads.title: Midnight Club: Los Angeles Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Download the Picture Pack Today. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Midnight Club Los Angeles - Trailer 3 (HD)
childDownloads.description: Feel the speed of the Audi R8 and witness the world's fastest tour of Los Angeles in Trailer 3. The next iteration of the highly acclaimed Midnight Club racing franchise is coming October 7, 2008. Pre Order Now.

childDownloads.title: Police Car Pack
childDownloads.description: Now you can dodge the cops by downloading the free Midnight Club Los Angeles Police Car Pack. Race in the Border, Highway or Squad Patrol cars (choose from the 1996 Chevrolet Impala or Dodge Charger SRT8) for the ability to evade the cops at red lights and race at high speeds - but don't trespass or the chase is on. Download the pack now, and get your cop cars from the vehicle showroom as they unlock.

childDownloads.title: South Central Map Expansion
childDownloads.description: Get tons more streets to race in with the free South Central Map Expansion which expands Midnight Club: Los Angeles by one third, adding four new neighborhoods to make up the iconic district of South Central.  Download the South Central Map Expansion to race online with friends who have the South Central Premium Upgrade or for single-player offline cruising.  The South Central Map Expansion features real world L.A. landmarks such as Exposition Park, the USC campus, Shrine Auditorium, Crenshaw Plaza, and the L.A. Memorial Coliseum.

childDownloads.title: South Central Premium Upgrade
childDownloads.description: South Central Premium Upgrade is the total South Central experience for Midnight Club Los Angeles delivering 9 new vehicles, 26 new races, 12 new battle maps, 10 new delivery missions, over 100 new red light races, new vinyl packs, new parts, new music, and the free South Central Map Expansion which expands the massive city of Midnight Club: Los Angeles by one third, adding four neighborhoods that make up the iconic district of South Central.  Features the following 9 vehicles:  Luxury: 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK63 AMG “Black” SUV: 2008 Range Rover Supercharged, 2008 Range Rover Sport Super Charged Lowrider: 1955 Chevy Bel Air, 1963 Buick Riviera, 1964 Chevy Impala, 1965 Chevy Malibu Muscle: 1970 Chevy Chevelle, 1966 Pontiac GTO.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: South Central Trailer
childDownloads.description: Get more streets to race in with the Free South Central Map Expansion and South Central Premium Upgrade featuring unique new vehicles, amazing new races and more. South Central Downloadable Content for Midnight Club: Los Angeles Coming March 12th.

childDownloads.title: South Central Ultimate Content Pack
childDownloads.description: The South Central Ultimate Content Pack combines the South Central Premium Upgrade, the 2 South Central Vehicle Packs and the South Central Map Expansion. This pack includes 16 new vehicles, 26 new races, 12 new battle maps, 10 new delivery missions, over 100 new red light race challenges, new parts and more.  Includes the following vehicles: 2008 Lancer Evolution X, 2008 Ducati 1098 R, 2007 Aston Martin DB9, 2009 Mitsubishi Eclipse GT, 2008 Mercedes-Benz CLK63 AMG “Black”, 2008 Mercedes-Benz CL 65 AMG, 2008 Audi S5, 2008 Cadillac XLR V, 2008 Range Rover Supercharged, 2008 Range Rover Sport Super Charged, 1955 Chevy Bel Air, 1963 Buick Riviera, 1964 Chevy Impala, 1965 Chevy Malibu, 1970 Chevy Chevelle, 1966 Pontiac GTO.  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: South Central Vehicle Pack 1
childDownloads.description: South Central Vehicle Pack 1 adds some extra class to your garage with 3 new high-performance vehicles, the 2008 Mercedes-Benz CL 65 AMG, the 2008 Audi S5, and the 2009 Mitsubishi Eclipse GT.  Download South Central Vehicle Pack 1 and automatically receive the South Central Map Expansion, which expands the massive city of Midnight Club: Los Angeles by one third, adding four new neighborhoods to make up the iconic district of South Central.  Features the following 3 vehicles: Luxury: 2008 Mercedes-Benz CL 65 AMG, 2008 Audi S5 Tuner:  2009 Mitsubishi Eclipse GT  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: South Central Vehicle Pack 2
childDownloads.description: South Central Vehicle Pack 2 brings power and status, featuring the 2008 Cadillac XLR V, the 2008 Lancer Evolution X, the 2007 Aston Martin DB9 and the free 2008 Ducati 1098 R.  Download South Central Vehicle Pack 2 and automatically receive the South Central Map Expansion, which expands the massive city of Midnight Club: Los Angeles by one third, adding four new neighborhoods to make up the iconic district of South Central.  Features the following 4 vehicles: Bike: 2008 Ducati 1098 R (FREE) Luxury: 2008 Cadillac XLR V Tuner: 2008 Lancer Evolution X Exotic: 2007 Aston Martin DB9  There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
